name: Zula Europe
content:
files:
- SteamSetup.exe: https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/SteamSetup.exe
game:
  appid: '513650'
  arch: win64
  args: -nojoy -applaunch 513650
  custom-name: Zula Europe
  exe: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Steam/Steam.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating 64-bit prefix ...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/
    src: SteamSetup.exe
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/SteamSetup.exe
- task:
    app: d3drm
    arch: win64
    description: DirectX ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    arch: win64
    description: DirectX ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx9_43
    arch: win64
    description: DirectX 9 ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d9vk
    arch: win64
    description: Vulkan ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    args: /S
    description: Steam ...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/SteamSetup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: win8
    arch: win64
    description: Windows version 8 ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- write_file:
    content: Manual
    description: Creating logon.ini ...
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program\ Files\ \(x86\)/Steam/steamapps/common/Zula\ EU/login.ini
- execute:
    command: echo "lang=9" >> $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program\ Files\ \(x86\)/Steam/steamapps/common/Zula\
      EU/login.ini
    description: Changing language option ...
system:
  disable_compositor: true
  pulse_latency: true
  xboxdrv: xboxdrv
wine:
  Audio: pulse
  d9vk: true
  esync: true
  overrides:
    winedbg.exe: d
  version: ge-protonified-nofshack-4.9-x86_64
